entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Port-Menier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:24 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Menier 02:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -9.7°C
Wind: WSW 37 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow squalls. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 12:21 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 12:21 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
